summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the grading and regrading of Mercer Street and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, to the grades established by Ordinance No. 53100; providing for the payment of the costs of said grading and regrading from the Mercer Street Local Improvement Fund, District No. 4557, created by Ordinance No. 53296, in accordance with Resolution No. 8372, and appropriating the sum of Ten Thousand Dollars ($10,000.00) from the General Fund as a temporary loan thereto and providing for the repayment thereof.
